Posts.Content: tamaravoice wrote: Hi everyone, Just underwent a bilateral mastectomy and am doing well so far. I am doing the Oncotype DX right now and am looking for an onocologist.  A friend told me her sister loved Dr. Ruth Oratz.  Anyone else have an opinion on Dr. Oratz or another female oncologist in NYC.  All input appreciated - this is overwhelming stuff....   Tamara Dx 7/7/2010, IDC, 1cm, Stage I, Grade 2, 0/1 nodes, ER+/PR+ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Dr. Ruth Oratz? tamaravoice tamaravoice

Posts.Content: Sep 10, 2010 01:28PM tamaravoice wrote:  Thanks so much - I am at NYU so I will look Dr. Smith up and have her in my back pocket!   Hope you are well and appreciate the advice- Tamara
